roleset.name: remove the outer layer (ie cortex or scar tissue)
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 2 will be more common than arg 1
But arg 1 will still appear - deferentiate by deciding whether you would want it left in tact or not (and/or if it would cover and impede something you would want left in place).
